belongs_to_collection.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin Collection

original_title: 機動戦士ガンダム THE ORIGIN VI 誕生 赤い彗星
overview: The episode will focus on the young Zeon ace Char Aznable earning his "Red Comet" nom de guerre, as well as the beginnings of the Federation's "Project V" weapons project that will eventually birth the RX-78-2 Gundam.
title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin VI – Rise of the Red Comet
